title.rendered: Agency Insights for Building Your 2018 Marketing Plan

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1517262035700{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background: #666468 url(/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/single-resource-page-1902×496.png?id=158417) !important;}” el_class=”ss-title-row”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Agency Insights for Building Your 2018 Marketing Plan

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1517262394908{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1516912101423{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On-Demand Webinar
Air Date: January 18, 2018
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1507570167359{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156780″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1513695999503{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156851″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1513696054670{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Stay ahead of the curve with these actionable tips from agency peers

Still struggling to finalize your 2018 marketing strategy? Learn from the experts – tune in and find out what digital marketing agencies are focusing on in the new year.

Todd Lebo, CMO of Ascend2, will reveal the results of our recent survey 2018 Digital Marketing Plans From the Agency Perspective,and we’ll analyze what it means for marketers. He’ll cover:

  • The most important strategic objectives of 2018
  • Marketing budget trends
  • Effective tactics that deliver real results

[/vc_column_text]

Your Hosts:

Todd Lebo

Partner/CMO, Ascend2

At Ascend2, Todd helped develop a research-based marketing methodology that is used by marketing technology firms and agencies to generate demand and supplement content. Prior to joining Ascend2, Todd led the MarketingSherpa marketing, content, research and business development teams.

Koertni Adams

Partner Enablement Manager, SharpSpring

Koertni came to SharpSpring from a partner agency. She has walked in your shoes pitching and using marketing automation. She now develops content, programs, events and other resources to help agency partners become even more proficient at growing revenues and serving clients.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1507570006488{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch The Webinar:

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column]
Watch Webinar
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1517235624817{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

No contracts. Cancel any time.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
